title: Meat Grinder, Manual Household Aluminum Alloy Mincer Machine Sausage Meat Grinder Pepper Spice Grinding Machine with Sausage Stuffing Tube, Food Grinding Mincing Machine for Meat, Sausage
features: [High‑hardness Aluminum Alloy Material]: Our meat grinder adopts high‑hardness aluminum alloy for one‑time molding and precise casting, which is durable in use and anti‑rust. Fine, strong blade that won't dull or wear after multiple grindings and is durable for a long service life

[Effortless Ergonomic Handle]: With a comfortable handle, it conforms to ergonomics and lever principle, the operation is labor‑saving and convenient. Easy, simple and effortless operation, allowing you to get finely ground meat quickly

[Five‑segment Spiral Extrusion]: The meat grinder adopts five‑segment spiral extrusion to imitate manual beating, which is easy to use and suitable for home kitchen use. Multi-level auger and cutting blade working simultaneously makes meat spirally extruded many times and instantly minced

[Simple Operation]: Equipped with forged high‑quality cutter heads, with fine perforations, the skeined meat is delicate and smooth. Just turning the handle several times, the manual meat mincer makes you get ground meat without touching the blades

[Multifunctional Mincer Machine]: Easy to install, the meat grinder is suitable for mincing pork, beef, chicken, various spices, peppers, etc. and sausage making. A sausage stuffing tube is included to make it easier to make your own unique sausage
